title.rendered: Luminostics Announces FDA Authorization and Production Scale-Up of US-Manufactured Smartphone-Based COVID-19 Rapid Test

content.rendered:
Written by newsfeed

Components of the Clip COVID Test The reusable iPhone-based Clip Analyzer, the Clip COVID iOS app, and the single-use Cartridge, Swab, Extraction Tube, and Dropper Tip comprise the Clip COVID Rapid Antigen Test. Demo video of Clip COVID 3-minute video showing the simple end-to-end workflow of the Clip COVID Rapid Antigen Test. Luminostics’s Clip COVID Rapid Antigen Test uses a smartphone-based analyzer to obtain results in 30 minutes from nasal swabs in decentralized settingsClip COVID’s emergency use authorization (EUA) in December 2020 closely followed the award of a $26.
